trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: Handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError> event lets you handle exceptions thrown by code outside your control (for example, by an external data source).
trans-unit.target: 처리는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError>이벤트 (예를 들어 외부 데이터 원본)에서 컨트롤 외부 코드에서 throw 된 예외를 처리할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.Context%2A> property to determine the state of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> at the time of the exception.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.Context%2A>속성의 상태를 확인 하 고 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>에서 예외 발생 시.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.Context%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.Exception%2A> property to retrieve the exception data.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.Exception%2A>예외 데이터를 검색할 속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to handle the exception by additional event handlers, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 추가 이벤트 처리기로 예외를 처리 하려는 경우 설정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A>속성을 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCancelEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCancelEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> properties normally indicate the cell in which the data error occurred.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCancelEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCancelEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>속성은 일반적으로 데이터 오류가 발생 한 셀을 나타냅니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCancelEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCancelEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the error occurs in an external data source, however, the data source may not provide the column in which the error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 하지만 외부 데이터 원본에서 오류가 발생 데이터 원본을 제공할 수 없습니다 오류가 발생 한 열.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCancelEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> property typically indicates the column of the current cell at the time of the error.
trans-unit.target: 이 경우에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCancelEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>일반적으로 속성은 오류 발생 시 현재 셀의 열을 나타냅니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCancelEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The exception that occurred.
trans-unit.target: 발생 한 예외입니다.

trans-unit.source: The column index of the cell that raised the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 발생 하는 셀의 열 인덱스는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell that raised the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 발생 하는 셀의 행 인덱스는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts"></xref> values indicating the context in which the error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 비트 조합 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts"> </xref> 오류가 발생 한 컨텍스트를 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets details about the state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> when the error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 상태에 대 한 세부 정보를 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> 오류가 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> enumeration may be combined using the bitwise `OR` operator to represent the state of a data-bound <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> when a data error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 멤버는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts>비트를 사용 하 여 열거형을 결합할 수 있습니다 `OR` 데이터 바인딩된의 상태를 나타내는 연산자 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>데이터 오류가 발생 했습니다..</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a user enters an invalid cell value (such as entering a name in a cell that requires a date) and then selects a different cell, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> will try to commit the invalid cell value.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어, 사용자가을 잘못 된 셀 값 (예: 날짜 해야 하는 셀에 이름을 입력)을 입력 한 다음 다른 셀을 선택는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>잘못 된 셀 값을 적용 하려고 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When the commit fails, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> will raise a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError> event whose Context property will have a value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts>.
trans-unit.target: 커밋에 실패 한 경우, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError>해당 컨텍스트 속성 값 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> 갖습니다 이벤트</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError> 를 발생 합니다</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts"></xref> values that specifies the context in which the error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 비트 조합 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts"> </xref> 오류가 발생 한 컨텍스트를 지정 하는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception that represents the error.
trans-unit.target: 오류를 나타내는 예외를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: To handle the exception by more than one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventHandler>, throw the exception again at the end of a handler by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 둘 이상의 예외를 처리 하 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventHandler>를 설정 하 여 처리기의 끝에서 다시 예외를 throw는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A>속성을 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Exception> that represents the error.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception>오류를 나타내는입니다.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to throw the exception after the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventHandler"></xref> delegate is finished with it.
trans-unit.target: 처리 한 예외를 throw 할지를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventHandler"> </xref> 대리자는 작업이 완료 된 것입니다.

trans-unit.source: Set this property to `false` if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventHandler> has dealt with the exception represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.Exception%2A> property, and you do not want to propagate the exception to another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventHandler> that may handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError> event.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정 `false` 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventHandler>으로 표시 되는 예외 처리에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.Exception%2A>속성을 다른 예외를 전파 하지 않으려는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventHandler>처리할 수 있는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventHandler> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.Exception%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: For debugging purposes, it can be useful to propagate the exception and inspect the stack trace for information regarding the context of the error.
trans-unit.target: 디버깅 목적을 위해 예외를 전파 하 고 오류의 컨텍스트에 대 한 정보에 대 한 스택 추적을 검사 하는 것이 유용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the exception should be thrown; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>예외 throw 하는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: When setting this property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.Exception*> property value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정할 때는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.Exception*>속성 값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.Exception*>
